basics.label: Finance Manager
basics.summary: Financial Lead with company oversight, committed to strategic management and quality performance.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Financial and accounting lead for the division responsible for P&L performance, achieving EBTIA and working capital targets.
highlights: Partner with executive team driving strategic growth and initiatives
Customer MDA negotiations, margin schedules and profit models
Monitors divisional SOX compliance, month end procedures and gap closure performance
Manages and supports the inventory control team, accounting clerk staff, contract coordinators, and IT

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for internal accounting and human resource functions.
highlights: In Charge of G/L and distribute P&L reports for USA headquarters and South East Asia (SEA) distribution center
Implemented control procedures; training decision makers on key ratios and operating activities
Implemented necessary policies, ensuring company compliance with state and federal regulations.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Primary role is to monitor control systems and management reporting, ensuring accurate and timely preparation of financial statements.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Performed accounting support for three company locations.
